name: SwapSelf
description:
A short, 2D platformer with the ability to swap colors and collisions. Avoid the spikes, activate shrines, and reach the exit door in this bite-sized adventure. Use skill and timing to bound through four stages.

Controls
  • Use "WASD" or "↑←↓→" to move. Hold the JUMP button to jump for longer and higher.
  • The "F" and "J" keys are used to SWAP colors.
Kudos
  • Assets, graphical and audio, are provided by Kenney.
  • This game was made in the Godot Engine.
